text: @ZekeJMiller @PressSec Well she is right -- the US is a leader in Covid-19, we are NOT leaders on Covid-19 -- but we are definitely a case study in WHAT NOT TO DO.  Seriously do any of these people, besides Trump, actually believe their own hype?
